name: Fireman (Pure Mental Games)
description:
Fireman is inspired by an old Game&Watch LCD handheld from the 80's - simple, retro arcade action.

In the original, you control two firemen holding a trampoline.  You move left & right to bounce babies as they fall from a burning building into an ambulance.

In THIS version, there are not only *babies* falling, but also aliens and bombs!  Everything now needs to be bounced into the correct vehicle & you change between an ambulance, spaceship and bomb disposal van with up/down - this adds a whole new dimension to the gameplay!

As you might imagine, you need to bounce babies to ambulances, aliens to spaceships & bombs to bomb disposal vans - bouncing things into the wrong vehicle may result in anything from a splat to interplanetary war!

Within the options, you can enable "easy mode" which means you can bounce anything into any vehicle - for an experience more akin to the original.
